answers.answer: Not really signs of a heart attack but could be related to a heart circulation problem.  After 3 weeks certainly a trip to your internist should happen. Sounds like an inflimation of the lining of the lung. Spelling ? Pluricy

question: hi , i was wondering if somebody can help , i am a 51yr old female with newly diagnosed diabetes , i have a dull ache i the left side of my chest under my breast , i have had this for about 3 weeks , i also have a slight ache in my ribs under my arm, and yesterday i started to get an ache in my back ( left hand side ) below my shoulder , and for quite a long time i have had a burning sensation in the left side of my breast and my nipple , i  had a mammogram and an ultra sound 4 months ago , everything ok , i have no weakness in my limbs and i am not out of breath , just this dull ache , but it is bothering me ....help
title: symptoms of a heart attack or not ?
